name: GreenLeaf Organics
idea: A direct-to-consumer organic skincare brand that creates personalized skincare routines using AI skin analysis. GreenLeaf Organics combines clean, sustainable ingredients with cutting-edge technology to deliver custom formulations that actually work for your unique skin type.

business.target_audience: Health-conscious women aged 25-45 who want effective, clean skincare products but are overwhelmed by generic one-size-fits-all solutions
pain_points: Generic skincare products that don't address individual needs
Confusion about which ingredients actually work
Concerns about harmful chemicals and sustainability
Expensive trial-and-error with products that don't deliver
business.value_proposition: Get a personalized, organic skincare routine that's scientifically formulated for your unique skin
unique_selling_points: AI-powered skin analysis from a simple photo
Custom formulations made fresh for you

features.title: AI Skin Analysis
features.description: Upload a photo and our AI analyzes your skin type, concerns, and environmental factors to create your perfect routine.

features.title: Clean Ingredients
features.description: Every product features organic, ethically sourced ingredients. No parabens, sulfates, or synthetic fragrances.

features.title: Made Fresh
features.description: Your custom formulations are made to order in small batches, ensuring maximum potency and freshness.
